*** Settings ***
Library           ../CodeLibWrapper.py

*** Keywords ***
KW_Assert_CompareTwoFile
    [Arguments]    ${SourceFilePath}    ${TargetFilePath}
    ${IsShouldBeEqual}    Assert File Compare    ${SourceFilePath}    ${TargetFilePath}
    [Return]    ${IsShouldBeEqual}    # 判断这两个文件是否相同.

KW_Assert_CompareTwoDirectory
    [Arguments]    ${source_dir}    ${target_dir}    ${output_report_dir}
    Assert Dir Compare    ${source_dir}    ${target_dir}    ${output_report_dir}
